b'Shingeki no Kyojin-ten 360\xc2\xb0 Tai: b'Virtual reality movies included with the Blu-ray/DVD releases of Shingeki no Kyojin Season 2.\n\nThe first volume contained "Roar," in which Eren first achieves a titan form. The second volume came with two more episodes. In the first, Levi speaks with new recruits; in the second, Mikasa makes a confession.'
